scripts.say: After countless hours of development, we've finally been able to manifest our first new comrade, nya!
However, we still have much to learn about the hidden powers of the Wisdom Cube, nya.
Even though this successful manifestation has allowed us to meet a powerful new ally, they are still in an incomplete state, nya.
Priority ships can only reach their full potential when we further strengthen their "Cognition," nya!
Discover specific "Blueprints" through the Tech Academy, and use them to further strengthen your comrade in the "Development Dock," nya!
In addition to the Tech Academy, these blueprints can also be obtained during events, nya!
If your head starts hurting from all the research, Akashi's shop is always open for you, nya~â™ª
